articles.author: Alicia Adamczyk
articles.title: High-net worth families are racing against the clock to shield their wealth before the estate tax increases - Fortune
articles.description: The estate tax exemption could be halved in 2026. The wealthiest Americans are taking note.
articles.content: The wealthiest people in the U.S. could see major tax hikes after next year, sending high-net worth clients to financial planning offices around the country to try to get around them, their money man… [+4113 chars]
